Application.Management

Class ScenarioManagementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Management.ScenarioManagementController

  • @SessionAttributes(value="scenarioId")
 @Controller
public class ScenarioManagementController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing Scenarios.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

      • getScenarioManagementPage

public java.lang.String getScenarioManagementPage(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Returns the page for creating a new Scenario.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        Returns:
        "scenario-management" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • createScenario

        @RequestMapping(value="/create-scenario",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String createScenario(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                              @ModelAttribute(value="scenarioDescription")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="narrative")
                                                                                                              int idNarrative,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="scenarioName")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String title,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="img")
                                                                                                              org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile img,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(name="coupleScenario",required=false,defaultValue="0")
                                                                                                              int scenarioGroup,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="scenario-first-dim-name")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String firstDimName,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="scenario-first-dim-desc")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String firstDimDesc,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="scenario-second-dim-name")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String secondDimName,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="scenario-second-dim-desc")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String secondDimDesc,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="imgCredits")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String imgCredits,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="referral_code")
                                                                                                              int referral_code,
                                                                                                              @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String user_id)
                                                                                                       throws PictureUploadException
        Implements the creation of a new Scenario.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        description - String, description of the new Scenario.
        idNarrative - Integer, identifier of the Narrative to which the new Scenario belongs.
        title - String, title of the new Scenario.
        img - MultipartFile, cover picture of the new Scenario.
        scenarioGroup - Integer, identifier of the group to which the new Scenario belongs (used to solve localizations.
        firstDimName - String, name of the first dimension of the new Scenario.
        firstDimDesc - String, description of the first dimension of the new Scenario.
        secondDimName - String, name of the first dimension of the new Scenario.
        secondDimDesc - String, description of the first dimension of the new Scenario.
        imgCredits - String, URL to the author of the picture used as cover image for a Scenario.
        referral_code - String, ReferralCode.value of the ReferralCode to use for the new Scenario.
        user_id - String, cookie of the creator of the new Scenario.
        Returns:
        "redirect:/scenario-panel" string redirecting to the specified Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.
        Throws:
        PictureUploadException - PictureUploadException, exception in uploading the cover image for the new Scenario.

      • createNarrative

        @RequestMapping(value="/create-narrative",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String createNarrative(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="narrativeName")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="narrativeDescription")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="narrativeLang")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String lang)
        Implements the creation of a new Narrative.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        name - String, name of the new Narrative.
        description - String, description of the new Narrative.
        lang - String, language code for the new Narrative.
        Returns:
        "fragments/narrative-management-fragment :: narrative" string, specifying the Thymeleaf fragment to parse and return to the client.

      • createReferralCode

        @RequestMapping(value="/create-referral-code",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String createReferralCode(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="referralName")
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String name)
        Implements the creation of a new ReferralCode.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        name - String, name to identify the new ReferralCode. A numeric identifier is automatically assigned on creation.
        Returns:
        "fragments/referral-code-fragment.html :: referral_code" string, specifying the Thymeleaf fragment to parse and return to the client.

      • getCoupableScenarios

        @RequestMapping(value="/retrieve-coupable-scenarios",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String getCoupableScenarios(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="narrativeName")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String narrativeName,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="narrativeLang")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String narrativeLang)
        Returns the Scenarios from a given Narrative, in a certain language, for which exists an alternative localization.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        narrativeName - String, name of the Narrative.
        narrativeLang - String, language code of the Narrative.
        Returns:
        "fragments/coupable-scenarios-fragment :: coupable" string, specifying the Thymeleaf fragment to parse and return to the client.

        @RequestMapping(value="/scenario-panel",

public java.lang.String getScenarioPanel(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                     @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")

        Returns the page for viewing all of the Scenarios created by an Administrator.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - String, identifier of an Administrator.
        Returns:
        "scenario-panel" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • deleteScenario

        @RequestMapping(value="/deleteScenario",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String deleteScenario(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="selectedScenario")
                                                                                                             int idScenario)
        Updates the status of a Scenario to 'Deleted'. This operation does not deletes any data related to a Scenario.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        idScenario - Integer indicating the identifier of a Scenario.
        Returns:
        "redirect:/scenario-panel" string redirecting to the specified Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • updateScenario

        @RequestMapping(value="/updateScenario",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String updateScenario(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                             @ModelAttribute
                                                                                                             Scenario editedScenario,
                                                                                                             org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(name="statement0",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String s1,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(name="statement1",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String s2,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(name="statement2",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String s3,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(name="statement3",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String s4,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(name="statement4",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String s5)
        Updates the details of a Scenario.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        editedScenario - Scenario which details have been changed.
        bindingResult - see BindingResult.
        s1 - String, 1st Question for the new Quiz.
        s2 - String, 2nd Question for the new Quiz.
        s3 - String, 3rd Question for the new Quiz.
        s4 - String, 4th Question for the new Quiz.
        s5 - String, 5th Question for the new Quiz.
        Returns:
        "redirect:/scenario-panel" string redirecting to the specified Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • getScenarioDetails

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/getScenarioDetails",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String getScenarioDetails(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="idScenario")
                                                                                                                                   int idScenario)
        Returns the details of a Scenario given its identifier.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        idScenario - Integer indicating the identifier of a Scenario.
        Returns:
        JSON formatted string containing the details of the specified Scenario.

      • getScenarioRefCode

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/getScenarioRefCode",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String getScenarioRefCode(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="idScenario")
                                                                                                                                   int idScenario)
        Returns the ReferralCode given the identifier of a Scenario.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        idScenario - Integer indicating the identifier of a Scenario.
        Returns:
        JSON formatted string containing the details about the ReferralCode of the specified Scenario.
